text: Season one of El Artista del Año premiered on April 28, 2018, on the América Televisión network. On July 7, 2018, Pedro Loli was crowned the champion of the season, Micheille Soifer finished second, while Rossana Fernández- Maldonado finished third. == Cast == === Contestants === The ten contestants were presented during the first week of the show. {| class= "wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center; margin:auto; align: center" |- ! Contestant ! Notability (known for) ! Status ! class="unsortable"| |- | Patricio Parodi | Model | style="background:lightgreen;"|Withdrew | |- | Milett Figueroa | Model & actress | style="background:#f4c7b8;"|Eliminated 1st | |- | Cielo Torres | Singer & actress | style="background:#f4c7b8;"|Eliminated 2nd | |- | Alfredo Benavides | Host & comedy actor | style="background:#f4c7b8;"|Eliminated 3rd | |- | Josimar Fidel | Singer | style="background:lightgreen;"|Withdrew | |- | Yahaira Plasencia | Singer | style="background:lightgreen;"|Withdrew | rowspan="5"| |- | Luis Baca | Singer & actor | style="background:#f4c7b8;"|Eliminated 4th |- | Rossana Fernández-Maldonado | Actress, singer and hostess | style=background:tan|Third place |- | Micheille Soifer | Singer | style=background:silver|Runner-up |- | Pedro Loli | Singer | style=background:gold|Winner |} === Hosts and judges === Gisela Valcárcel and Jaime "Choca" Mandros were the host and the co-host, respectively. Morella Petrozzi, Lucho Cáceres, Fiorella Rodríguez and Cecilia Bracamonte were the judges. During the third week, musical director Juan Carlos Fernández replaced Bracamonte. == Scoring charts == {| class="wikitable sortable" style="margin:auto; text-align:center; white-space:nowrap" |- !
